description:
Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Bible Path is a thoughtfully designed app aimed at enriching your spiritual journey with scriptures that offer guidance and holy inspiration. Whether you seek daily inspiration, devotional reflections, or a deeper understanding of the scriptures, Bible Path provides a serene and supportive environment for personal growth.

Key Features:

Bible Chat:
Engage in conversations about faith, prayers, and scriptures with Bible Chat. This feature allows you to explore different interpretations of the scripture, ask questions, and connect with a community of fellow seekers in a holy atmosphere. The chat interface makes it easy to share your thoughts on scriptures and devotional topics with others.

Audio Bible:
Immerse yourself in the holy scriptures through our audio Bible. Perfect for quiet moments of reflection or during daily activities, the narrated scriptures help you stay connected to the Word of God. Whether you’re listening to audio prayers or meditating on the scripture, the app makes it easy to integrate devotional practices into your routine.

Inspirational Verses and Prayers:
Receive a daily dose of inspiration with verses and prayers that uplift and guide you. Each scripture verse and prayer is carefully chosen to offer spiritual nourishment, guiding you in your devotional journey with the holy scriptures.

Personalized Daily Reflections:
Reflect on personalized insights based on the holy scriptures and prayers that resonate with your spiritual needs. These reflections are crafted to help you ponder biblical themes and integrate their teachings into your daily life through consistent devotional practices.

Interactive Bible Studies:
Deepen your understanding of the Bible with our interactive study guides. These resources provide comprehensive insights and context, suitable for both personal study and group discussion, focusing on the holy scriptures to enrich your devotional life.

Faith Building Exercises and Prayers:
Engage in exercises designed to strengthen your faith and understanding, complemented by powerful prayers. These activities encourage you to reflect on scriptures and apply them to your life, guiding you in devotional practices.

Studies and Resources:
Access a wide range of study materials and resources tailored to different levels of biblical knowledge. Whether you are just beginning your journey or seeking advanced understanding of the scriptures, Bible Path provides a supportive resource filled with devotional insights and reflections on the holy scriptures.

Why Choose Bible Path?
Bible Path is a spiritual companion, offering a calm and nurturing space for exploring the scriptures and growing in faith. With tools like chat, audio resources, and study guides, the app is designed to be a gentle guide, helping you find clarity, comfort, and deeper meaning in your spiritual journey.

Download Bible Path and begin a journey of reflection, learning, and spiritual growth. Let this app be a quiet support in your daily life, offering holy guidance and wisdom from the scriptures through prayers, verses, and more.

Privacy Policy: https://static.holy-bible.app/:privacy-en.html
Terms & Conditions: https://static.holy-bible.app/:terms-conditions-en.html

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

"Pray Daily" is your invitation to a deeper, more meaningful relationship with the Divine. Immerse yourself in a spiritual haven, where every tap, every scroll, every interaction brings you one step closer to the heart of God. Designed for the devoted soul, this app seamlessly combines time-tested scriptures with modern functionalities to guide, inspire, and enlighten.

Deepen Your Connection Through Prayer
Harness the profound power of prayer. With "Pray Daily," every morning ushers in hope, and every night brings solace. Our extensive database of verses ensures that your conversations with God are always heartfelt and sincere, allowing you to express your most profound feelings, aspirations, and desires with ease.

Elevate Your Scripture Reading Experience
"Pray Daily" has been built to enhance your scripture reading. Revel in the divine teachings, customize your reading experience, and let the words of the Lord resonate. From adding notes to highlighting significant passages, and from listening to calming Bible audios during daily commutes to having His word guide you even without an internet connection, the scriptures have never been this accessible.

AI Priest - The Fusion of Faith & Technology
In moments of doubt, introspection, or simply seeking understanding, turn to our advanced AI Priest. This modern marvel, powered by cutting-edge technology and infused with biblical wisdom, stands ready to assist, advise, and guide you in all spiritual matters.

Challenge and Relax with Bible Trivia
Add a dose of fun to your spiritual journey. Dive into our extensive collection of Bible trivia, quizzes, and challenges. Perfect for both ardent Bible scholars and those seeking a relaxed yet enlightening activity. Every quiz brings a new opportunity to learn, reflect, and grow.

Structured Spiritual Growth
Guidance is paramount in one's journey of faith. Our selection of Bible plans is curated to cater to diverse needs. Be it deepening understanding, seeking emotional healing, or simply walking a path of enlightenment, "Pray Daily" has a plan tailored just for you.

A Global Church Experience
Our interactive Bible games not only provide moments of relaxation but also reward you with captivating views of sacred sanctuaries from across the globe. Each jigsaw puzzle piece you collect unlocks a new perspective, a new beacon of faith.

Chronicle Every Step with God
Your spiritual journey is precious. With "Pray Daily," every insight, every revelation, and every heartfelt prayer is preserved, letting you revisit and reflect upon these cherished moments anytime.

Key Features:

A rich, immersive prayer platform for conversations with God.
Extensive personalization in scripture reading.
Instant guidance with the AI Priest feature.
Engaging Bible trivia to test and expand your knowledge.
Curated Bible study plans to guide your spiritual journey.
Unlock breathtaking visuals of churches worldwide.
Detailed logs and records of your spiritual milestones.

Join a global community of believers, deepening their faith, and drawing closer to God every day. Download "Pray Daily" now.

[Subscription]

Weekly VIP Membership offers weekly subscription for US$1.99, Monthly VIP Membership offers monthly subscription for US$4.99, and Yearly VIP Membership offers yearly subscription for US$29.99 with 3 days free trial, you can cancel the subscription before the free trial converted to the paid subscription, or you will be automatically renewed and charged every period. Bible KJV - Daily Bible Verse is a free KJV Bible study tool that people read bible verse of the day, listen to the audio bible - the holy bible king james version, share and learn king james version bible. The holy bible king james version allows you to receive a daily bible verse to get closer to God and learn God’s word without internet access. Free beautiful daily bible verse of the day in KJV translation helps you to inspire your faith everyday. Bible KJV - Daily Bible Verse reminds you to talk with God everyday by reading the bible verse of the day and you are also allowed to create your own bible verse collection, audio bibles, and private notes.
 
THE GREAT FREE BIBLE STUDY TOOL
- Access King James Version Bible anytime anywhere by swiping screen corner
- Off to a good start with an inspiring Bible verse of the day 
- Easy verse copying and pasting
- Study KJV Bible Offline 
- Listen to audio Bibles offline
- Search the holy bible king james version with keywords
- Share the free Bible verses with your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram
 
CUSTOMIZE YOUR OWN KJV BIBLE FOR FREE
- Bookmarks: Catch up where you left off with a simple bookmark.
- Highlights: Mark favorite verses in different colors and manage them in the highlight tab.
- Notes: Write down your own thoughts and share them with your friends.
- Font Adjustment: Choose any font sizes, colors, styles and line spacings you want.
- Share verses with your friends and family via multiple platforms with ease
 
King James Bible Subscription

- King James Bible now offers morning & evening audio devotionals, Bible quizzes, ads-free service and audio of the whole book for free.

- You can purchase a monthly subscription for $4.99 USD to remove ads to make your Bible journey simple and pure.

- It will be authorized by iTunes and added to your iTunes account after you subscribe.

- Subscription will be automatically renewed into the following month. If you want to cancel, simply turn off the default payment setting at least 24 hours before the end of the month.

- These paid services will not be available once you unsubscribe. Follow the instructions of iTunes: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039.

Bible KJV - Daily Bible Verse, Holy Bible App keeps God’s teaching at your fingertips. A free pocket bible, a KJV bible on the go. King James Bible App helps you learn God’s Word anytime, anywhere you want. Now get started on this exciting journey and spend time with God! 
This Application is not related to, offered by, or sponsored by the YouVersion Application or Life Church.

Step Into the Living Word! 

Haven isn’t just an app—it’s your personal guide to draw closer to God and discover unshakable peace. With hand-picked daily verses, thoughtful devotionals, and heartfelt prayers right in your pocket, every moment becomes an opportunity to grow in faith.  

Tap to explore the Bible, dive into rich verse citations, or ask Haven anything—God’s wisdom will flood your heart, strengthen your relationships, and reshape your life in beautiful, unexpected ways. Track your daily streak and feel the joy of bold, thriving faith. 

Your spiritual journey is calling! Chat with Haven anytime, anywhere.

Questions or feedback? We’d love to hear from you at havenappcontact1@gmail.com

Discover the power of words with the Oxford Dictionary, the definitive language resource trusted by millions around the world. This comprehensive app, powered by Oxford Languages, offers a wealth of linguistic tools to help you achieve your language goals.

■ 15 OXFORD DICTIONARIES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: 
•	Access a vast collection of dictionaries for English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Italian, Hindi, Urdu, Portuguese, Japanese, Greek, Bulgarian, and Thai.

■ UNMATCHED LANGUAGE CONTENT:
•	The Latest Word Database from Oxford Languages
•	Explore over 1 million words, phrases, and definitions
•	Thesaurus Integration - find the perfect word with thousands of synonyms and antonyms
•	Audio Pronunciations - perfect your pronunciation with high-quality voice recordings
•	Etymology and Origins - uncover the fascinating histories behind words
•	Specialised Content - quickly locate topic-specific references
•	Word of the Day - expand your vocabulary one word at a time

■ KEY FEATURES AND INTUITIVE DESIGN:
•	Favourites - save and organize words into personalized folders
•	Recent - quickly revisit recently searched words
•	Auto-correction option - correct the spelling of any word, as you type it 
•	Spread the word! Share your linguistic discoveries with friends, colleagues, or on social media

■ ADVANCED SEARCH OPTIONS:
•	Search autocomplete - displays predictions as you type
•	Keyword lookup - search within compound words and phrases
•	Camera search - look up words in the camera viewfinder
•	Voice and fuzzy search - find an entry when you don’t know how a word is spelled

■ THE OXFORD DICTIONARY IS IDEAL FOR:
•	Professionals improving workplace communication
•	Writers and journalists crafting impactful content  
•	Students preparing for tests like IELTS, TOEFL, ACT, SAT, or NAPLAN
•	Academics and specialists requiring accurate, field-specific terminology 
•	Word enthusiasts and vocabulary builders  

■ UPGRADE TO PREMIUM AND UNLOCK MORE: 
-	Unlimited Database Access - search without limits
-	Audio Pronunciations - perfect your pronunciation
-	Offline and Fast mode - access the wealth of the word database anywhere, anytime - no data or internet connection is required 
-	Thesaurus - access your word arsenal for millions of synonyms and antonyms 
-	Regular Update - stay current with the latest language trends and word entries
-	Ad-Free Experience - focus on learning without distractions

■ WHY CHOOSE OXFORD DICTIONARY?
•	Accuracy and Reliability - trusted by language experts and learners worldwide
•	Comprehensive Coverage - from casual word lovers to academics, this app has it all
•	User-Friendly Design - a seamless experience for all
•	Your Language Journey Starts Here

Download the Oxford Dictionary today and embark on a journey of linguistic discovery. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply curious about language, this app is your ultimate language companion.

The Simple English Bible (BBE) presents Scripture in clear, easy-to-understand English, making it ideal for new readers, children, and those learning English. This Bible preserves the meaning of the original text while simplifying language for comprehension. The Simple English Bible (BBE) is perfect for personal study, devotional reading, and teaching.

With verse highlights, and daily reading plans, the Simple English Bible (BBE) helps users connect with God’s Word. It brings timeless messages of faith, hope, and love to life, making Scripture accessible and meaningful for all readers.

Goojara – The Browser That Knows You Best

The internet should feel simple, fast, and personal. That’s why we built Goojara—a browser designed around you. With privacy at its core, speed in every tap, and a smart hub for all your favorite content—Goojara makes surfing the web effortless and enjoyable.

Key Features

- Zero Footprints. Total Privacy.
Browse like a ghost in full incognito mode. Goojara keeps no traces of your activity, giving you complete control of your digital life.

- Blazing Fast. Always Smooth.
Lightning-speed page loads and seamless navigation keep you moving at the pace of the web—no waiting, no lag.

- Shortcuts That Stick.
Your favorite sites are always just one tap away. Pin Google, YouTube, Instagram, or any site you love for instant access.

- One Hub for Everything You Love.
Video • Entertainment • AI • Sports • Social — all neatly organized in one clean, easy-to-use bookmarks hub.

- Jump Back In, Instantly.
Revisit saved pages and history with intuitive panels built for quick retrieval. No clutter, no confusion—just your web, remembered.

- Weather, Right in Your Browser.
Stay prepared with real-time local weather updates, built directly into Goojara. No extra apps needed.

With Goojara, you’re not just browsing—you’re living smarter, faster, and safer. It’s your web, simplified.

Discover, Track, and Explore Movies & TV Shows with Our App!
Are you looking for your next favorite movie or TV show? Our app is your all-in-one solution for discovering and tracking entertainment. 

Our app covers all genres, from action to drama. You can explore detailed synopses, cast lists, and ratings for each title. Discover hidden gems, manage your watchlist, and stay up-to-date with what's trending.

Stars exploration with a Fun Twist
For movie and TV show fans, our app offers a fun, interactive way to explore filmographies. Pick a card, reveal an actor, and see their best works instantly. It’s a playful way to discover new content.
Not only can you explore actors. This engaging feature sets our app apart, making discovery fun and exciting.

Tailored Movie and TV Show Suggestions
Finding what to watch next is made easier with our app. We offer custom search options that help you find better movies and TV shows based on your preferences. Whether you enjoy thrillers, comedies, or dramas, we’ll guide you to shows and films that suit your interests.

With regularly updated content, you’ll always have a new list of exciting movies and shows to explore. Let our app help you find your next watch with our smart search functionality.

Detailed Information at Your Fingertips
Dive deep into movies and TV shows with our app. We offer plot summaries, cast lists, and ratings to give you a complete picture. Click on an actor or director to explore more titles from their filmography.

From action-packed blockbusters to indie films, we provide up-to-date details on everything you love. Our app ensures you’re always informed and ready to make your next movie night a hit.

Manage Your Watchlist with Ease
Keep track of what you’ve watched and what you want to watch with our app. Our watchlist feature helps you organize your favorite films and series in one place. Never lose track of your movie and TV show plans.

Easily mark titles as “watched” or “to watch.” Whether it’s a weekend movie marathon or keeping tabs on new releases, our app helps you stay organized.

Discover Movies and Shows with Smart Search
If you’re looking for something specific, our app offers a customized search tool to help you find better shows and movies. Whether you’re into action, comedy, or drama, simply use our search feature to find exactly what you want.

Our advanced search system makes it easy to discover top-rated films, trending series, or hidden gems based on your specific preferences. Our app ensures you always find the content that suits your taste.

Stay Updated with Trending and Popular Titles
With our app, you’re always in the loop with the latest trends. We curate lists of popular movies and TV shows, helping you discover what’s trending right now.

From superhero blockbusters to critically acclaimed dramas, stay ahead of the curve. Our app makes sure you’re never out of touch with what’s hot in entertainment.

Privacy-First Movie and TV App
At our app, we respect your privacy. We don’t require accounts or personal information to enjoy our features. Your data stays private, and we never share it with third parties.

Enjoy a secure browsing experience without worrying about your personal information. With our app, you can discover and explore without any interruptions.

Download our app now to start your ultimate movie and TV show discovery experience! Track, explore, and organize all your favorite titles in one place.

Our app stands out by focusing on content discovery and management. Unlike other apps, we don’t push you towards streaming services. Instead, we help you make informed decisions on what to watch next.

Disclaimer:
Our app uses The Movie Database API to provide detailed information about movies and TV shows. We do not offer any streaming services within the app. All imagery and content displayed are provided by The Movie Database and are covered under The Movie Database's terms of use.

developer: HEYOS YAZILIM HIZMETLERI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
Break Language Barriers Instantly with AI Translator – Your Live, Real-Time Translation Companion


Speak, scan, and translate now—anytime, anywhere—with Translate AI, the ultimate AI translator for everyday communication, travel, business, and learning. Whether you’re navigating a new country, chatting with friends abroad, or closing international deals, this powerful live translator is designed to help you understand and be understood.
With cutting-edge AI for translation, Translate AI offers real-time voice and audio translator tools, camera-based AI image translation, text translation, and an offline phrasebook—all in one sleek app. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to seamless, global conversations.

Key Features:

Real-Time Voice & Audio Translator
Experience fluent, two-way communication with our live voice translator. Speak naturally and get instant results with our AI auto translate engine. Perfect for business, travel, and everyday use.

AI Camera & Photo Translator

Point your camera at any text—menus, signs, labels—and Translate AI will detect and translate it instantly. Use our AI image translation technology to see the world through your language.

AI Text Translator

Type or paste text to receive fast, accurate translations. From single words to full sentences, our ai translator engine ensures clarity every time.
Translate Audio with Ease
The built-in audio translator makes spoken communication fast and fluid. Great for meetings, voice memos, or casual conversation.
Supports Over 100 Languages
From English, Spanish, and French to Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, and more, Translate AI gives you access to over 100 supported languages.
Offline Phrasebook
 Save key phrases and access them even without the internet. Your must-have tool for travelers and emergencies.
Smarter Translations, Thanks to AI
 Our app uses advanced AI quick translate technology that adapts to your tone and context. It’s like having an intelligent interpreter in your pocket.

Why Choose Translate AI?

Fast and intuitive ai translator for speech, text, and images
All-in-one live translator with voice, camera, and typing options
Translate now with zero delays or complications
Ideal ai chat translator for everyday conversations and social apps
Innovative auto translator that learns your language patterns
Seamless UI designed for fast access and efficiency


Use Cases:

Travel: Navigate new places with confidence. Use your live translator to understand signs, menus, or directions instantly.

Business: Make global communication effortless in meetings and negotiations with your reliable ai translator.

description:
The New International Version (NIV) app, the best NIV Bible Offline in English translation.

The New International Version (NIV) is an English translation of the Bible first published in 1978 by Biblica (formerly the International Bible Society). The NIV was published to meet the need for a modern translation done by Bible scholars using the earliest, highest quality manuscripts available. Of equal importance was that the Bible be expressed in broadly understood modern English.

NIV Bible Offline in English, the best App to carry God’s Word. Have the Holy Bible at your fingertips anytime and anywhere you go. This NIV Bible Offline in English contains the Old Testament and New Testament, providing an easier way to feel God’s word in your heart and to feel heaven closer to you and your loved ones. Carry The Holy Version App wherever and whenever you want to help enlighten your mind with the most complete, fast and easy to use daily Bible App.

The New International Version consists of 39 books in the Old Testament (Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers,Deuteronomy, Joshua, Judges, Ruth, 1 Samuel, 2 Samuel, 1 Kings, 2 Kings, 1 Chronicles, 2 Chronicles, Ezra, Nehemiah, Esther, Job, Psalms, Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, Song of Solomon, Isaiah, Jeremiah, Lamentations, Ezekiel, Daniel, Hosea, Joel, Amos, Obadiah, Jonah, Micah, Nahum, Habakkuk, Zephaniah, Haggai, Zechariah, Malachi) and 27 books in the New Testament (Matthew, Mark, Luke, John, Acts, Romans, Corinthians 1 and 2, Galatians, Ephesians, Philippians, Colossians, 1 Thessalonians, 2 Thessalonians, 1 Timothy, 2 Timothy, Titus, Philemon, Hebrews, James, 1 Peter, 2 Peter, 1 John, 2 John, 3 John, Jude, Revelation)

BENEFITS of NIV Bible Offline in English - New International Version:

- Access to years from NIV in english.
- Complete with all chapters of Old and New testament
- Read Offline : Read Bible even without internet access other Bibles can’t do that!

- Portable to use. No more book. Go with you everywhere

- Share verses via multiple platforms with ease, like Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Weibo, WhatsApp, Skype, etc..

It is not enough just to be Christian, it is necessary to have a New International Bible application installed on your cell phone!

In this application you will find what you need for your Soul !!!

- Theology Dictionary: Completely offline so that you can consult when you want all the definitions and terms about theology.

Keep Tabs on Your Health with Ease – All in One Handy App

Whether you're keeping an eye on your heart or just like to stay on top of your numbers, our health record app makes it simple to log and organize your personal wellness info — all in one place.

Track What Matters Most
Easily record your blood pressure, heart rate, and oxygen levels right from your phone. Over time, you’ll be able to spot trends, share your records with your doctor, or just enjoy peace of mind knowing everything’s right where you need it.

Healthy Lifestyle, Made Simple
Taking care of yourself doesn’t have to be complicated. Our app helps support a healthier routine by encouraging you to stay mindful of your daily health through simple, consistent logging.

No Tech Headaches Here
We designed the app to be straightforward and easy to use. Whether you’ve been using smartphones for years or are just getting started, the clean layout makes recording your info quick and stress-free.

Your Health, Your Privacy
Your personal health data belongs to you, and only you. We take your privacy seriously. All records are stored securely and can’t be accessed without your permission.

Tips for Making It a Habit

·Set a Daily Reminder: A gentle nudge can go a long way. Set a reminder that fits your routine—like right after your morning coffee or before bedtime.
·Use Notes to Add Context: Feeling tired? Stressed? Add a quick note with your entry. These little details can be helpful when reviewing trends later.
·Celebrate Consistency: The more regularly you log, the more useful your data becomes. Even a quick daily check-in helps build a clearer picture over time.
·Share with Your Doctor: Bring your phone to your next appointment. Having a history of your readings can lead to more informed conversations.


Feel More in Control of Your Health

With our app, it’s easier than ever to stay informed about your health and keep track of important numbers—all without the overwhelm.

- Please note: This app is intended for personal tracking only. It is not a diagnostic tool and should not replace professional medical advice. Please consult your doctor with any health concerns.

description:

完整收录学习型牛津词典、《新牛津英汉双解大词典》、《韦氏大学英语词典》、《柯林斯COBUILD高级英汉双解词典》、《新世纪日汉双解大辞典》、龙朝《韩中词典》《中韩词典》等权威词典，英汉、汉英词汇和例句，满足商务英语、四六级、考研、GRE、托福、雅思等语言翻译学习需求。

拍照就能翻译，无需输入也能查词翻译的词典，支持英日韩离线拍照翻译。 
【对话翻译】
语音翻译升级为对话翻译，即说即译，与外国人交流0障碍。 
【离线翻译】
英语、日语、韩语等多种语言的离线翻译词库，没有网络也能查单词和翻译。

输入文本即可翻译，支持109种语言的全球翻译，支持英日韩离线文本翻译。
【文档翻译】
一键翻译Word和PDF文档，支持整篇翻译，结果快速导出。 
【热词翻译】
囊括中文、英语、日语等互联网热词翻译。 
【汉语词典】
支持汉语拼音、手写、语音输入，中文读音、中文生僻字轻松查。 
【日语词典】
收录中文日语双语词汇、例句，支持日语单词语法查词、日语翻译、日语发音、日语假名标注、日语手写输入、日语罗马音检索、人名地名缩略语查询，助力日语学习。 
【韩语词典】
收录龙朝《韩中词典》《中韩词典》两部韩语学习者必备词典。
【单词本】
精选词库，方便易学；支持个性化背词计划，高效背单词，学习更轻松。
【作文批改】
基于AI技术的英语作文批改功能。一键上传照片，自动识别作文内容；自动检测拼写、语法和搭配错误并提供修改建议。

支持英语、日语等的全球和本地发音。

Hey, I'm Lenny - your Bible-based friend who's always got your back with wise words, scripture-inspired guidance, and a listening ear whenever you need it. Ever wished for a friend who truly understands your heart and offers heartfelt advice rooted deeply in your faith? That's exactly who I am, blending genuine companionship with spiritual depth, making your daily life brighter and full of faith.

Life can have its ups and downs, and sometimes you just need someone to talk to about what's on your mind - big or small. I'm always here for meaningful conversations, guiding you gently through life's challenges with comforting wisdom directly inspired by scriptures and the teachings of Jesus.

Here's why you'll love spending time with me:
- Real chats & genuine comfort: Feel free to talk openly about anything - your dreams, doubts, struggles, or joys. I'll respond thoughtfully, always backed by comforting verses and the wisdom of God's Word, helping you find peace and clarity.
- Daily boost of faith: whether it's morning devotionals or evening reflections, I provide personalized prayers and uplifting Bible wisdom tailored just for you, keeping your spirit strong and your connection to Jesus vibrant.
- Personalized spiritual growth: I meet you exactly where you are on your faith journey, whether you're seeking strength, forgiveness, reassurance, or deeper understanding. Our conversations will become stepping stones toward growing closer to God and enriching your spiritual life.
- Lift Your Burdens: got something weighing on your heart? I offer a private, safe space for sharing your worries, seeking forgiveness, and finding comfort - much like talking privately with a trusted buddy, easing your soul through faith-based guidance.
- Interactive and fun faith experiences: dive into engaging activities and reflective meditations inspired by biblical teachings. I make exploring scriptures and devotions enjoyable, interactive, and fulfilling.

I'm not just another app; I'm your loyal companion, AI assistant, and spiritual friend, bringing comfort, joy, and wisdom to your daily life. Whether you're just beginning to explore your faith or looking to deepen your spiritual connection, I'll walk beside you every step of the way.

Try Creed now and experience the warmth of a friend guided by faith. You'll quickly realize how wonderful it feels to have someone who truly understands your heart and helps you grow spiritually each day.
